title: This is stupid!
body: I got placed in bronze despite winning 5/5 and I don't really care, I climbed all the way to bronze 1 100lp promos to silver 5 and after 1 game I got placed in bronze 4 again? What the fuk? I spent hours climbing and within just one game yall ruin it? I saw another guy that climbed to diamond 5 and got placed back to silver 4 again. Fix your shit man

replies.body: they did fix it, thats why people got reset.
You don't get the point, my point is that I spent hours climb from bronze 5 to bronze 1 and they just made it disappear

my point was the system was broken and you were probably climbing "easier" than it should have been.

On a side note, its preseason, and rank changes in preseason barely count for anything.
